## Vault.trash() method

Tries to move to system trash. If that isn't successful/allowed, use local trash

**Signature:**

```typescript
trash(file: TAbstractFile, system: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  file | [TAbstractFile](./obsidian.tabstractfile.md) | The file or folder to be deleted |
|  system | boolean | Should move to system trash |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
